front.title: An IKEv2 Extension for Supporting ERP

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to the IKEv2 protocol that allows an IKE Security Association (SA) to be created and authenticated using the EAP Re-authentication Protocol extension as described in RFC 5296bis. NOTE TO RFC EDITOR: Replace 5296bis in the previous paragraph with the RFC number assigned to draft-ietf-hokey-rfc5296bis (now in the RFC Editor queue)
